instructions:
Toss together cabbage and carrots in large bowl.
Cook bacon and onion in medium skillet over medium heat, stirring often, until bacon is crisp. Remove from heat; drain and discard drippings. Add coleslaw dressing to onion mixture, stirring to scrape up any browned bits from bottom of skillet.
Pour warm dressing over cabbage; toss.
Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours. Toss again just before serving.
ingredients: 2 slices Archer Farms™ bacon, cut into small pieces
title: Red Cabbage Slaw
